Under Smolensk at the border with the Republic Belarus is stuck in kilometers of traffic.

Society♪1 day 3 hours ago

Products are falling, nerves are on the edge. We've been in the editorial for the past two days with a few calls from the D-boys. The heavy-duty drivers complain that they have become more difficult to enter Russia through the Smolen region from Belarus.

To share the news.

Video: In Smolenska, they recall Paul Nahimov's stance in honour of the 170th anniversary of the Sinop battle.

Society♪2 days ago

On 30 November, we recall the heroes of the Sinop battle. It was 170 years ago that the Russian escapade destroyed the Armada Osmana-pashi in the city of Sinop on the south coast of the Black Sea. The action of the Russian ships was commanded by our landman, Vice Admiral Pavel Nahimov.

To share the news.

Under Smolena, an MES officer rescued a fisherman who fell under ice.

Society♪2 days ago

The hero of this story is Alexei Shevelev. For more than 15 years, he has been honoured to serve in an emergency department, with no life saved from fire and smoke. In his legitimate weekend, he went off with stitches on Lake Bucklanowski and proved that there was always a place to go.
